metadata.title: Vornado 783DC Energy Smart Full-Size Air Circulator Fan with Variable Speed Control and Adjustable Height
features: POWERFUL VORTEX ACTION — Utilizes Vornado's signature Vortex air circulation and an energy-efficient, brushless DC motor to more effectively move air throughout the entire room.
VARIABLE SPEED CONTROL — True variable speed settings allow for precise airflow control, conveniently located on the front of the circulator.
MULTI-DIRECTIONAL AIRFLOW — Equipped with a pivoting head and adjustable height (25” to 38”) to direct the air where you need it. The base is easy to assemble, no tools required.
OPTIMUM PERFORMANCE — Deep-pitched blades paired with an inlet guide cone, enclosed air duct, and spiral grill help move air up to 100 ft. Made in the USA of U.S. and imported parts.

SUPERIOR SUPPORT — When you choose a Vornado Energy Smart fan you’re investing in superior performance and design that will deliver total satisfaction. If not, we’ll replace it, for 10 years. Supported by a customer service team based in Andover, KS.
Built to meet U. S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U. S.
description: Combining our classic style with a more-powerful airflow (up to 100′), the brushless DC motor of the 783DC uses up to 80% less energy, bringing modern efficiency to the home. A return to variable speed puts you in precise control of your environment, and our signature Vortex Action creates whole-room circulation, keeping the entire room cool and comfortable. And when adjustability is needed its sturdy stand adjusts to 25”or 38”. We’re proud that the 783DC is designed, engineered and assembled in the USA. And with our 10-year satisfaction , these DC circulators will keep you comfortable for years (and years) to come.

IMPORTANT INTERNATIONAL DISCLAIMER: This item is built to meet U.S. voltage requirements and may not function properly when used in conjunction with external devices that alter or convert voltage or frequency of electricity. Improper use or shipping the product outside the U.S. will void all warranties.
